org.campbelll.life

Class Life

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.campbelll.life.Life
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SequentialLife

    public abstract class Life
extends java.lang.Object
    Interface for Conway's Game of Life implementations in org.campbelll.life.

    Rules for Conway's Game of life can be found here.

    Author:
    Campbell Lockley

    • Method Detail

      • age

        public abstract void age()
        Calculates the next generation in the Game of Life.

      • warmup

        public void warmup(int times)
        Runs the age() method the specified number of times to give the JIT compiler opportunity to do some optimisation.
        Parameters:
        times - Number of warmup iterations. 100 times works well.

      • loadPattern

        public void loadPattern(java.io.InputStream in)
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        FileFormatException
        Loads a starting pattern for the game of life from an input stream.

        First line of input stream must have: "[x] [y]"

        • x - x position in board where pattern starts
        • y - y position in board where pattern starts

        Following that is any number of lines representing the pattern. Space denotes "dead" cells, and any character which is not a space denotes a "live" cell. Multiple patterns can be loaded onto the same board using this method.

        Parameters:
        in - Input stream to load starting state from.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is an I/O error.
        FileFormatException - if format of pattern in the InputStream is incorrect.

      • printBoard

        public void printBoard(int width,
                       int height)
                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Prints part of the current state of the board to stdout.

        printBoard(40, 40) will print the top left 40x40 section of the board.

        Parameters:
        width - Width to print.
        height - Height to print.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • clearBoard

        public void clearBoard()
        Clears the Game of Life board.

        Call before loadPattern() to start the Game of Life with a board containing just the loaded pattern.
